entry.string: The AuthURL module allows you to authenticate a user based on their access to another URL/site. The AuthURL module sends a HTTP basic authentication request to the specified URL with the credentials supplied from the login form.
entry.translation: Zee OothOoRL mudoole-a elloos yuoo tu oozeenteecete-a a user besed oon zeeur eccess tu unuzeer URL/seete-a. Zee OothOoRL mudoole-a sends a HTTP beseec oozeenteeceshun reqooest tu zee speceeffied URL veet zee credenteeels sooppleeed frum zee lugeen furm.

entry.string: Authentication by AuthURL is automatically set once the the AuthURL module has been initialized. To remove AuthURL authentication, you must remove the module.
entry.translation: Oozeenteeceshun by OothOoRL is ootumeteecelly set oonce-a zee zee OothOoRL mudoole-a hes beee ineetielized. Bork bork bork! Tu remufe-a OothOoRL oozeenteeceshun, yuoo moost remufe-a zee mudoole-a.

entry.string: From the menu, you have one choice. "Modify Config". From here, you:
entry.translation: Frum zee menoo, yuoo hefe-a oone-a chueece-a. "Mudeeffy Cunffeeg". Frum here-a, yuoo:

entry.string: Set the URL to authenticate users against.
entry.translation: Set zee URL tu oozeenteecete-a users egeeenst. Um de hur de hur de hur.

entry.string: Allow a user that successfully authenticates to be automatically added to the Xaraya database and allowed to login.
entry.translation: Elloo a user thet sooccessffoolly oozeenteecetes tu be-a ootumeteecelly edded tu zee Xereya detebese-a und ellooed tu lugeen.

entry.string: Set the default group that users are added to if they are automatically created.
entry.translation: Set zee deffoolt gruoop thet users ere-a edded tu iff zeey ere-a ootumeteecelly creeted. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: Set the level of output that this module logs (useful for seeing what is happening under the hood).
entry.translation: Set zee lefel ooff ooootpoot thet thees mudoole-a lugs (useffool fur seeeeng vhet is heppeneeng under zee huud).

entry.string: There are no included blocks with the AuthURL Module
entry.translation: Zeere-a ere-a nu inclooded blucks veet zee OothOoRL Mudoole

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond here-a. [mudooles mudoole-a]
